member.name: T:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions
member.summary: Provides static methods for converting data types.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.BooleanFromString(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a string to a boolean.
member.param: The string to convert.
The default value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A boolean based on the given string.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.BooleanToString(System.Boolean,Rampastring.Tools.BooleanStringStyle)
member.summary: Converts a boolean to a string with the specified style.
member.param: The boolean.
The style of the boolean string.
member.returns: A string that represents the boolean with the specified style.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.FloatFromString(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a string with the English number format to a float.
member.param: The string to convert.
The default value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A float based on the given string.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.DoubleFromString(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a string with the English number format to a double.
member.param: The string to convert.
The default value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A double based on the given string.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.IntFromString(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a string with the English number format to an integer.
member.param: The string to convert.
The default value to return if the conversion fails.
member.returns: An integer based on the given string.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.BoolArrayIntoBytes(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Converts an array of booleans into an array of bytes, packing 8 boolean values into a single byte.
member.param: The boolean array.
member.returns: The generated array of bytes.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.Conversions.ByteToBoolArray(System.Byte)
member.summary: Converts a byte to an array of 8 booleans.
member.param: The byte.
member.returns: An array of 8 booleans.

member.name: T:Rampastring.Tools.ExtendedStringBuilder
member.summary: A StringBuilder that can automatically add a separator between appended strings.

member.name: P:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.SectionName
member.summary: Returns the name of the INI section.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.AddKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a key to the INI section. Throws a if the key already exists. Use if you want to replace an existing key instead.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value of the INI key.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.AddOrReplaceKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a key to the INI section, or replaces the key's value if the key already exists.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value of the INI key.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.RemoveKey(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a key from the INI section. Does not throw an exception if the key does not exist.
member.param: The name of the INI key to remove.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetBooleanValue(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value from the INI section.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value to return if the section or key wasn't found, or converting the key's value to a boolean failed.
member.returns: The given key's value if the section and key was found and the value is a valid boolean. Otherwise the given defaultValue.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetDoubleValue(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a double-precision floating point value from the INI section.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value to return if the section or key wasn't found, or converting the key's value to a double failed.
member.returns: The given key's value if the section and key was found and the value is a valid double. Otherwise the given defaultValue.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetIntValue(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an integer value from the INI section.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value to return if the section or key wasn't found, or converting the key's value to an integer failed.
member.returns: The given key's value if the section and key was found and the value is a valid integer. Otherwise the given defaultValue.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetListValue``1(System.String,System.Char,System.Func{System.String,``0})
member.summary: Parses and returns a list value of a key in the INI section.
member.typeparam: The type of the list elements.
member.param: The INI key.
The separator between the list elements.
The function that converts the list elements from strings to the given type.
member.returns: A list that contains the parsed elements.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetSingleValue(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a single-precision floating point value from the INI section.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value to return if the section or key wasn't found, or converting the key's value to a float failed.
member.returns: The given key's value if the section and key was found and the value is a valid float. Otherwise the given defaultValue.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetStringValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string value from the INI section.
member.param: The name of the INI key.
The value to return if the section or key wasn't found.
member.returns: The given key's value if the section and key was found. Otherwise the given defaultValue.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.KeyExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the specified INI key exists in this section.
member.param: The INI key.
member.returns: True if the key exists in this section, otherwise false.

member.summary: Sets the boolean value of a key in the INI section. If the key doesn't exist, it is created.

The value of the INI key.

member.summary: Sets the double-precision floating point value of a key in the INI section. If the key doesn't exist, it is created.

member.summary: Sets the list value of a key in the INI section. The list elements are converted to strings using the list element's ToString method and the given separator is applied between the elements.

The list.

member.summary: Sets the string value of a key in the INI section. If the key doesn't exist, it is created.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IIniSection.GetPathStringValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses and returns a path string from the INI section. The path string has all of its directory separators ( / \ ) replaced with an environment-specific one.

member.name: T:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile
member.summary: A class for parsing, handling and writing INI files.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.ConsolidateIniFiles(Rampastring.Tools.IniFile,Rampastring.Tools.IniFile)
member.summary: Consolidates two INI files, adding all of the second INI file's contents to the first INI file. In case conflicting keys are found, the second INI file takes priority.
member.param: The first INI file.
The second INI file.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new INI file instance.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new INI file instance and parses it.
member.param: The path of the INI file.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates a new INI file instance and parses it.
member.param: The path of the INI file.
The encoding of the INI file. Default for UTF-8.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a new INI file instance and parses it.
member.param: The stream to read the INI file from.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates a new INI file instance and parses it.
member.param: The stream to read the INI file from.
The encoding of the INI file. Default for UTF-8.

member.name: P:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.AllowNewSections
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the parser should only parse pre-determined (via ) sections or all sections in the INI file.

member.name: P:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.Comment
member.summary: Comment line to write to the INI file when it's written.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.Reload
member.summary: Clears all data from this IniFile instance and then re-parses the input INI file.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.WriteIniFile
member.summary: Writes the INI file to the path that was given to the instance on creation.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.WriteIniStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the INI file to a specified stream.
member.param: The stream to write the INI file to.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.WriteIniStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Writes the INI file to a specified stream.
member.param: The stream to read the INI file from.
The encoding of the INI file. Default for UTF-8.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.WriteIniFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the INI file's contents to the specified path.
member.param: The path of the file to write to.

member.summary: Creates and adds a section into the INI file.
member.param: The name of the section to add.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.AddSection(Rampastring.Tools.IniSection)
member.summary: Adds a section into the INI file.
member.param: The section to add.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.MoveSectionToFirst(System.String)
member.summary: Moves a section's position to the first place in the INI file's section list.
member.param: The name of the INI section to move.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.EraseSectionKeys(System.String)
member.summary: Erases all existing keys of a section. Does nothing if the section does not exist.
member.param: The name of the section.

member.name: M:Rampastring.Tools.IniFile.CombineSections(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Combines two INI sections, with the second section overriding in case conflicting keys are present. The combined section then over-writes the second section.
member.param: The name of the first INI section.
The name of the second INI section.
